results.text: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.
results.reason: This verse marks the start of everything, highlighting God's power and creativity.
results.reflection: Reflect on the majesty of God's creation and His sovereignty over the universe.

results.text: Now the earth was formless and empty, darkness was over the surface of the deep, and the Spirit of God was hovering over the waters.
results.reason: This verse speaks to the presence of God even in chaos and void, preparing for creation.
results.reflection: Consider how God brings order and life into our own chaotic and empty spaces.

results.text: And God said, 'Let there be light,' and there was light.
results.reason: This verse demonstrates the power of God's word to bring light and life into existence.
results.reflection: Allow God's light to illuminate your life, bringing clarity and purpose.

results.text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
results.reason: This verse connects the creation narrative with the New Testament, emphasizing Jesus as the Word.
results.reflection: Recognize Jesus as the eternal Word, present at creation and in our lives today.

results.text: By faith we understand that the universe was formed at God's command, so that what is seen was not made out of what was visible.
results.reason: This verse affirms the creation story and the power of God's word in forming the universe.
results.reflection: Trust in God's creative power and His ability to shape your life in unseen ways.
